title: Exterior
body:
<<img, assets/images/levels/office_exterior.png>>

# Pelaaja käynnistää tarinan ensimmäistä kertaa.
<<if $visits == 0>>
	Another day, another crime.

	I guess the city never sleeps.
    
# Pelaaja palaa tähän nodeen uudestaan.
<<else>>
	<<if $hasAssignment == true>>
    	Alright, it's time to get to work!
    
    	# Estetään ettei pelaaja voi enää palata toimistoon.
    	<<link break "Office">>
        
        [[Go on assignment|Assignment]]
        
    <<else>>
		Ah... fresh air...
    
    	...I completely forgot what I came here.
        
	<<end>>
    
<<end>>

# Pelaaja voi mennä (takaisin) toimistoon.
[[Go inside|Office]]

title: Office
body:
<<img, assets/images/levels/office_day.png>>


<<if $hasAssignment == true>>
	# Näytetään ja piilotetaan hahmoja.
	<<character, show, secretary, x = 700>>

	Did you finally pick up your new assignment?
    
    <<character, show, detective, x = 260, xScale=-1>>
    
    Yeah, I did.
    
    I'll be off now...

	[[Time to head out|Exterior]]
<<else>>

	<<if $visits == 0>>
        # Näytetään ja piilotetaan hahmoja.
        <<character, show, secretary, x = 700>>

        You're late!

        <<character, show, detective, x = 260, xScale=-1>>
        <<character, hide, secretary>>

        It's too early in the morning for you to be shouting at me...

        <<character, show, secretary, x = 700>>

        Maybe I wouldn't have to shout if you didn't show up late every day.

        I'm counting on this job for my livelihood, you know.

        <<character, hide, secretary>>

        Yeah... sorry about that. I'll get right to it.

        [[Check your desk for a new assignment|Desk]]
        [[I forgot something outside|Exterior]]

    <<else>>
        <<character, show, secretary, x = 700>>

        Stop wasting time and get to work!

        <<character, show, detective, x = 260, xScale=-1>>
        <<character, hide, secretary>>

        Yeah... yeah... I'm on it.

        [[Check your desk for a new assignment|Desk]]
        [[I forgot something outside|Exterior]]
  	<<end>>
    
<<end>>

title: Assignment
body:
# Poistetaan taustakuva.
<<del background>>

Thank you for playing Roso Noir.

title: Desk
body:
# Annetaan pelaajalle "tämän tehtävä".
<<set $hasAssignment = true>>

Alright, here's the assignment.

I guess I'll read it on the way there...

[[Pick up the assignment|Office]]
